name: Immeowtal Festival!
description:
One day, Hachiko High School was bathed in heavenly light! The angels descended to judge, and the bodies of the dead dogs were piling up... but they were not all dead yet! Sora the Akita dog, vows to find his surviving furiends and strike back at the angels!

Will they make it home alive?

~~~

This game contains cartoon gore, bifurcated dogs, headless dogs, generally dogs not having a great time! 

~~~

This game is the PA series Fan-game and Another history of IF-Universe! Play the origin-series here! AND Play the IF-series first game here!

This game  is an apocalyptic dog dating dog your own dogventure fiction game. Trigger warnings include cartoon gore, bifurcated dogs, headless dogs, generally dogs not having a great time. Play at your own discretion!  All musics, Arts and programming by Rawfish. created using Renpy!
